code: import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Pagination=_ref=>{let{pages,page,setPage}=_ref;if(pages<=1){return null;}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{display:'flex',justifyContent:'center',marginTop:'2rem',paddingBottom:'2rem'},children:[...Array(pages).keys()].map(x=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>setPage(x+1),disabled:page===x+1,style:{padding:'10px 15px',margin:'0 5px',cursor:'pointer',backgroundColor:page===x+1?'#007bff':'white',color:page===x+1?'white':'black',border:'1px solid #ddd',fontWeight:page===x+1?'bold':'normal'},children:x+1},x+1))});};export default Pagination;
